  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater

  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: Onboard with a minimum resolution of 1280x768
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal sound card
  • Additional Notes: Supported import formats - Video: AVI, DV-AVI, HEVC/H.265*, MPEG-1/-2/-4, M(2)TS/AVCHD, MXV, MJPEG, MOV, WMV(HD) - Audio: WAV, MP3, OGG, WMA, MIDI - Images: JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIF | Supported export formats - Video: AVI, DV-AVI, MJPEG, MPEG-1/-2/-4, MOV, WMV(HD) - Disc: DVD, Blu-ray Disc - Images: JPEG, BMP, GIF

  • OS: Windows 10 | 8 | 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2,8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: edicated graphics card with 512 MB VRAM or more

To get the most from these functions, your system should at least meet the following recommended requirements. Check your operating system’s control panel for technical information about your computer.
